definitions.example: One visitor named Hou Yugang said he was not too concerned about climate change and Baishui’s melting.

definitions.definition: To identify as relevant or important

definitions.example: The painter was named as an accomplice.
My neighbor was named to the steering committee.

definitions.definition: (Westminster system politics) To initiate a process to temporarily remove a member of parliament who is breaking the rules of conduct.
The process of giving names to things.
A ritual or ceremony in which a person's name is given or announced.
Giving a name to a person or thing.
